title: Sampler, 1854
inscribed: Lo hizo Teresa Alvares y Gimenez Grazalema 22 de Febrero de 1854
description:
Rectangular embroidery sampler with tassels at the four corners and three bands of different instances of the alphabet. Below the alphabet is one band showing a human (hunter), dog, flowers, house, and bird and another band of flowers. At the bottom the piece reads: "Lo Hizo Teresa Alva -e-y Gimenez Grazalema 22 de Febrero de 1854"
Translation: "Made by Teresa Alva -e-y Gimenez Grazalema February 22, 1854"

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1854.
1854. Technique: embroidered. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-172.
